Events.Event_Name: STI co-infection for initial post-debut population
HCTUptakeAtDebut: state 0 (decision, sigmoid by year and sex)
HCTUptakePostDebut: state 3 (From LTFU or ART dropout back into HCT uptake loop)

Actual_IndividualIntervention_Config.NOTE: No Abort_States so we can churn from deep in the cascade

ANC/PMTCT: Enter ART staging from PMTCT?
ANC/PMTCT: Choose Single-Dose Nevirapine (sdNVP) or Combination (Option A/B)
ANC/PMTCT: Combination Option A or B?
ARTStaging: state 1 (random choice: linking from positive diagnostic test)
ARTStaging: state 2 (Muxer to make sure only one entry per DT)
ARTStaging: state 4 (check eligibility for ART, CD4 agnostic)

Events.Event_Name: ARTStaging: state 5 (random choice: Return for CD4 or LTFU)
ARTStaging: state 6 (check eligibility for ART by CD4)

OnPreART: state 2 (check eligibility for ART, CD4 agnostic)

Events.Event_Name: OnPreART: state 4 (check eligibility for ART by CD4)
